Sønnen skutt 24 ganger etter knivdrap
Skuespillerens sønn knivstakk sin egen mor til døde før han selv ble drept av politiet.
01 Nov 2019, 09:04 by Vilde Holta Røssland
Tidligere denne måneden ble «Tarzan»-skuespilleren Ron Ely (81) rammet av en familietragedie som har vekket oppsikt verden over.
Tirsdag 15. oktober ble kona hans, Valerie Lundeen Ely (62) funnet drept av en rekke knivstikk i parets hjem i Santa Barbara i California.
Sønnen Cameron Ely (30) ble raskt utpekt som mistenkt da politiet ankom åstedet, og som følge av at han «utgjorde en trussel» mot politiet, ble sønnen skutt på stedet.
30-åringen døde umiddelbart, og nå har det kommet fram nye detaljer fra den grufulle kvelden, skriver People.
24 skudd
I en pressemelding fra lensmannskontoret i Santa Barbara, bekrefter en talsperson for politiet at Cameron Ely ble skutt 24 ganger av politiet som rykket ut, og at han døde som følge av disse skuddskadene.
Da politiet ankom den aktuelle adressen 15. oktober, bekreftet Ron Ely at det var sønnen deres som var mistenkt for knivstikkingen. Sønnen var imidlertid ikke i huset, og politiet begynte å søke etter ham i området.
Det var Cameron selv som ringte politiet og varslet om hendelsen, og han skal i løpet av telefonsamtalen ha forsøkt å legge all skyld på faren.


STJERNE: Ron Ely er best kjent for rollen som Tarzan. Foto: NTB Scanpix Vis mer

Var ubevæpnet
Under søket fant politiet 30-åringen utenfor huset, der han hevdet å være utstyrt med skytevåpen. Da han latet til å strekke seg etter et våpen, fyrte de fire politimennene av sine skudd.
Det viste seg derimot i ettertid at 30-åringen ikke var bevæpnet.

«Da politimennene trygt kunne nærme seg Cameron med et skjold til beskyttelse, så de at han hadde løyet om at han var bevæpnet, og ikke hadde et våpen», heter det i pressemeldingen.

Det kommer også fram at en av politimennene ble skadd i søket, og at Ron Ely ble fraktet til sykehuset for videre undersøkelser - der det ble kjent at han ikke hadde noen skader.
Hva som var motivet bak det tragiske knivdrapet, er ikke kjent.
Ekteskap nummer to
Ron Ely og kona giftet seg i 1984, og har to døtre sammen i tillegg til den nå drepte sønnen. Valerie Lundeen Ely var skuespillerens andre kone, og var tidligere kjent som Miss Florida.
Cameron Ely var tidligere student ved eliteuniversitetet Harvard, der han hadde en grad i psykologi. Han var også en aktiv idrettsutøver der.
Rony Ely er i tillegg til å ha spilt Tarzan kjent for hovedrollen i filmen «Doc Savage: The Man of Bronze».
text:
Son shot 24 times after knife killing
The actor's son stabbed his own mother to death before he was even killed by police.
01 Nov 2019, 09:04 by Vilde Holta Røssland
Earlier this month, "Tarzan" actor Ron Ely (81) was hit by a family tragedy that has attracted worldwide attention.
On Tuesday, October 15, his wife, Valerie Lundeen Ely, 62, was found killed by a series of stabbings in the couple's home in Santa Barbara, California.
Son Cameron Ely, 30, was quickly identified as suspected when police arrived on the scene, and as a result of "posing a threat" to police, the son was shot at the scene.
The 30-year-old died immediately, and now new details have emerged from the gruesome evening, People writes.
24 shots
In a press release from the Santa Barbara County Sheriff's Office, a police spokesman confirms that Cameron Ely was shot 24 times by police who pulled out and that he died as a result of those gunshot injuries.
When police arrived at the relevant address on October 15, Ron Ely confirmed that it was their son who was suspected of stabbing. The son was not in the house, however, and police began searching for him in the area.
It was Cameron himself who called the police and notified the incident, and during the phone call he must have tried to blame all the danger.


THE STARS: Ron Ely is best known for the role of Tarzan. Photo: NTB Scanpix Show more

Was unarmed
During the search, police found the 30-year-old outside the house, claiming to be equipped with firearms. As he pretended to reach for a weapon, the four policemen fired from their gunshots.
However, it turned out in retrospect that the 30-year-old was not armed.

"When the policemen could safely approach Cameron with a shield for protection, they saw that he had lied that he was armed and did not have a weapon," the press release states.

It also emerges that one of the policemen was injured in the search, and that Ron Ely was transported to the hospital for further investigation - where it was known he had no injuries.
What was the motive behind the tragic knife-killing is unknown.
Marriage number two
Ron Ely and his wife married in 1984, and have two daughters together in addition to the now slain son. Valerie Lundeen Ely was the actor's second wife, and was formerly known as Miss Florida.
Cameron Ely was a former student at Harvard's elite university, where he had a degree in psychology. He was also an active athlete there.
In addition to playing Tarzan, Rony Ely is known for starring in the movie "Doc Savage: The Man of Bronze".
